sn35.123:1.3: Katame ca, bhikkhave, upadaniya dhamma, katamanca upadanam?
sn35.123:1.4: Santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuvinneyya rupa ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.123:1.6: Yo tattha chandarago, tam tattha upadanam …pe…
sn35.123:1.8: santi, bhikkhave, manovinneyya dhamma ittha kanta manapa piyarupa kamupasamhita rajaniya.
sn35.123:1.10: Yo tattha chandarago tam tattha upadanan”ti.
